ðŸ“– Summary: Documize Community is an open-source, self-hosted knowledge management solution designed for both technical and non-technical users. It aims to unify customer-facing and internal documentation, offering organization through labels, spaces, and categories. It supports multiple databases and authentication methods, along with multi-language support.
